page.title: 06Industry in Uddingston area
page.content: Uddingston's largest factory is Tunnock's Bakery where mostly women and girls work to make its famous car- amel wafers as well as cakes and pies. Two other large works are Levi's cloth- ing and Satchwell electrical controls. There are some smaller works in the town including depots for cold storage vans. Nearby there is a large trading estate with big showrooms and shops and car-parks. Not so many people are employed here even though it is so large. Uddingston's industry is almost all away from the centre of the town, apart from Tunnock's.
